member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.RequestingFocusOnKeyboardInputEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the RequestingFocusOnKeyboardInput event.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestion
member.summary: Enables access to the search suggestions that the SearchSuggestionManager provides.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestion.DetailText
member.summary: Gets the value that was passed to the *detailText* parameter of the AppendResultSuggestion method.
member.returns: The detail text, or **null** if the search suggestion is not a **Result**.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestion.Image
member.summary: Gets the value that was passed to the *image* parameter of the AppendResultSuggestion method.
member.returns: The image, or **null** if the search suggestion is not a **Result**.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestion.ImageAlternateText
member.summary: Gets the value that was passed to the *imageAlternateText* parameter of the AppendResultSuggestion method.
member.returns: The alternate text for Image, or **null** if the search suggestion is not a **Result**.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestion.Kind
member.summary: Gets the type of suggestion.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestion.Tag
member.summary: Gets the value that was passed to the *tag* parameter of the AppendResultSuggestion method.
member.returns: The tag, or **null** if the search suggestion is not a **Result**.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestion.Text
member.summary: Gets the localized text of the suggestion for display in the search suggestions UI.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestionKind
member.summary: Specifies the type of a SearchSuggestion.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestionKind.Query
member.summary: The suggestion is a query suggestion.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestionKind.Result
member.summary: The suggestion is a result suggestion.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestionKind.Separator
member.summary: Represents a separator between search suggestions that's useful for grouping.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestionManager
member.summary: Manages access to search suggestions for the in-app SearchBox control.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestionManager.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SearchSuggestionManager class.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestionManager.SearchHistoryContext
member.summary: Identifies the context of the search and is used to store the user's search history with the app.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestionManager.SearchHistoryEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether the user's previous searches with the app are automatically tracked and used to provide suggestions.
member.returns: **True** if the user's search history is automatically tracked and used to provide suggestions; otherwise **false**. The default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestionManager.Suggestions
member.summary: Gets the search suggestions for the current search query.

member.name: E:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestionManager.RequestingFocusOnKeyboardInput
member.summary: Raised when the user presses a key that initiates type-to-search.

member.name: E:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestionManager.SuggestionsRequested
member.summary: Raised when the user's query text changes and the app needs to provide new suggestions to display in the search box.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestionManager.AddToHistory(System.String)
member.summary: Stores the specified query in the search history.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestionManager.AddToHistory(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Stores the specified query and input language in the search history.
member.param: The input language. The input language ensures that the query string is displayed in the search history for the correct language.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestionManager.ClearHistory
member.summary: Clears all search history contexts for the current app.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestionManager.SetLocalContentSuggestionSettings(Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.LocalContentSuggestionSettings)
member.summary: Specifies whether suggestions based on local files are added automatically to the Suggestions collection, and defines the criteria that Windows uses to locate and filter these suggestions.
member.param: The new settings for local content suggestions.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestionManager.SetQuery(System.String)
member.summary: Assigns the current search query.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestionManager.SetQuery(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Assigns the current search query with the specified input language.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestionManager.SetQuery(System.String,System.String,Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.SearchQueryLinguisticDetails)
member.summary: Assigns the current search query with the specified input language and Input Method Editor (IME) info.
member.param: Info about the query text that the user enters through an Input Method Editor (IME).

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestionsRequestedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the SuggestionsRequested event.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestionsRequestedEventArgs.Language
member.summary: Gets the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) language tag (BCP 47 standard) that identifies the language currently associated with the user's text input device.
member.returns: The Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) BCP 47 standard language tag.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestionsRequestedEventArgs.LinguisticDetails
member.summary: Gets an object that provides linguistic information about query text that the user is entering through an Input Method Editor (IME).
member.returns: An object that provides linguistic information about the query text.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestionsRequestedEventArgs.QueryText
member.summary: The text that the app should provide suggestions for and that was in the search box when the SuggestionsRequested event was raised.
member.returns: The query text that the app should provide suggestions for.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Search.Core.SearchSuggestionsRequestedEventArgs.Request
member.summary: Gets an object that stores suggestions and information about the request.
member.returns: The object that stores suggestions and information about the request.
